data.title: Student Grades & Report Cards
data.text:
Accessing grades is an essential part of staying informed about academic progress. To help both students and parents easily check grades, we’ve provided step-by-step instructions tailored for each group. Students will use Clever to access their grades, while parents can view their child’s grades through the Focus Parent Portal. Follow the instructions below to get started.

Step 1: Go to single sign-on (SSO) page at sso.browardschools.com and click "Log in with Active Directory."

Step 2: Enter student ID and password to log in to the Clever Launchpad.

Enter Student ID number (example: 06########@my.browardschools.com).

Enter password (if forgotten, please contact your school).

Click Sign In button to access Clever.

Step 3: Select Focus for current grades and report cards.

To view current grades, click the Focus SIS tile on Clever. Grades will be displayed on the main landing page.

Instructions to view interim reports and report cards will be coming soon.

Step 1: Create a Parent Portal account visit https://www.browardschools.com/focus.

Step 2: Log into your Focus Parent Portal account at https://browardschools.focusschoolsoftware.com/focus/

Step 3: View student grades by logging into the Focus Portal or the BCPS Connect App, grades are displayed in the snapshot.

Select Grades under the student’s name panel to view your child's grades.

You may also click directly on a graded assignment.

For detailed instructions view, How to access Student Grades or Watch the video "How to Access Student Grades and Attendance".
